name: U(1) Gauge Coupling
description: U(1)_Y gauge coupling at M_Z with 2-loop RG evolution
formula: g₁(M_Z) = √(4πα)/√(1-sin²θ_W) × (1 + g₁²b₀ln(μ/M_Z)/(8π²) + g₁⁴b₁ln(μ/M_Z)/(128π⁴)), b₀=41/10, b₁=199/50, μ=2TeV

metadata.note: Hypercharge gauge coupling with 2-loop RG evolution from 2 TeV to M_Z
